refnamediv.refpurpose: It estimate (mean square) coherence of signals x and y.

refsynopsisdiv.title: Calling Sequence
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: [Pxx, freq] = mscohere (x, y) [Pxx, freq] = mscohere (x, y, window) [Pxx, freq] = mscohere (x, y, window, overlap) [Pxx, freq] = mscohere (x, y, window, overlap, Nfft) [Pxx, freq] = mscohere (x, y, window, overlap, Nfft, Fs) [Pxx, freq] = mscohere (x, y, window, overlap, Nfft, Fs, range) mscohere (...)

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This function estimate (mean square) coherence of signals x and y.

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.programlisting: [Pxx, freq] = mscohere(4,5) ans = PXX = Nan 1 FREQ = 0 0.5
